TopicTitle: Games will not load for some reason

Articles.Content:
Good morning.  Today, I tried to launch my game I have been playing for a couple of years and when I click the "Load" button, nothing happens.  I had a couple of other games saved and trying to launch them produce the same results.  I created a new game and that worked ok but when I exit the program and come back into it again, the new game will not launch either.  I have a lot of time and effort in this one game and I am hopeing there is a way to recover it.  

The game ran fine yesterday.  I am at a loss.
